column5: Does anyone know if there is an outfitter that will do 1 night overnight huts? Planning to travel to the North Bay/Temagami area. Everywhere I have seen is Friday noon until Sunday noon which is reasonable, but I think its too long for my trope. If I could find a Friday noon to Saturday noon or Saturday Noon to Sunday Noon, that would probably be ideal.
Just guessing but I think they may do it during the week only.
Thanks. Works for my mom and my grandfather, as for me...... I might need to wait until 2018. Ah well.
